product_name: Live TintedHueguard Skin Tint SPF 50 Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganHSA/FSA eligibleA weightless, light-medium buildable coverage skin tint with no-white-cast mineral SPF 50 that protects skin with all-day hydration and a radiant finish, Live Tinted's Hueguard Skin Tint SPF 50 Mineral Sunscreen Broad Spectrum has skincare actives to hydrate, protect, and smooth skin in one step.
details: DetailsFeaturesLight-medium buildable coverageMineral SPF 50 with a no white cast finishLightweight, non-greasy texturePowered by skincare actives to hydrate, protect, and smooth skinWater + sweat resistant for 80 minutesKey IngredientsZinc Oxide 9.5% is a non-nano zinc for a weightless formula that blends seamlessly into the skin without a white castButterfly Bush Flower Extract provides antioxidant protection against UVA damage, prevents the breakdown of collagen, and encourages skin repairIndian Gooseberry helps to diminish pigmentation and re-establish a natural radiance on skinHyaluronic Acid and Sea Buckthorn Oil provide advanced hydration, help retain moisture, and boost collagen productionBenefitsFragrance-freeNon-comedogenicDermatologist testedReef Friendly100% PCR TubeItem 2621475How To UseApply onto skin using your fingers or sponge. Feel free to layer until desired level of coverage is achieved - it's buildable!IngredientsActive: Zinc Oxide 9.5%. Inactive: Allantoin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Bisabolol, Buddleja Davidii Callus Extract, Butyloctyl Salicylate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, C13-15 Alkane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Coco-Caprylate, Crocus Sativus Flower Extract, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Glycerin, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Seabuckthorn) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Iron Oxides, Isoamyl Laurate, Lecithin, Methylpropanediol, Phenylpropanol, Physalis Pubescens Fruit Juice, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Silica, Silica Silylate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Tocopherol, Water/Aqua, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Apply onto skin using your fingers or sponge. Feel free to layer until desired level of coverage is achieved - it's buildable!

reviews.headline: Love IT üòç
reviews.comments: I love this product one of my favorite foundations EVER I so recommend it to other people

reviews.headline: Couldn't get past the smell
reviews.comments: The product is light weight and does not have an oily finish, which is perfect for oily skin. However, it has an unpleasant smell and because of the smell I was unable to continue using this product.

reviews.headline: flawless base in a bottle
reviews.comments: this goes for any live tinted complexion product, but you are basically guaranteed to have the best makeup days of your LIFE with this stuff. super buildable, the shades are beautiful, and it hardly feels like youre wearing anything. live tinted!!!!!

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: I wish there was more variety of cooler colored light tones but overall has a soft feel and doesn't stay super sticky and dewy like some other brands once it settles on your skin which is a plus in my book, I don't like that feeling on my face.

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments: Its ok, my first skin tint so im looking for other options

reviews.headline: smell is off-putting
reviews.comments: i love the coverage from this but i only wear it specifically for bech days where i will be gettign alot of sun. It smells like dry pet food it is very unpleasant i was worried maybe i got a bad prduct but the ones in store smelled the same

reviews.headline: I would highly recommend this product
reviews.comments: First timer with this brand. I love it. Perfect for those who don't wear makeup but want a little coverage. It has a natural, radiant, no white cast finish. Feels so hydrating and evened my skin. As a black woman I highly recommend and approve.

reviews.headline: So in love with this product
reviews.comments: I am so in love with this product and I use it daily! I have combo skin and live in Jacksonville, Florida so you already know that the humidity is alot. This product stays put and flawless all day long! Cant say enough how much I love this product. Shade range is also great, I used to use Laura Mercier's tinted moisturizer matte but they since changed their formula. I was upset but super thankful since I was able to find live tinted.

reviews.headline: Nice coverage
reviews.comments: I like the coverage. However, it's a tad bit expensive compared to other brands I've tried & liked.

reviews.headline: best daily sunscreen
reviews.comments: This product feels amazing on. My skin loves it and it blends easily using my fingers. I have been frustrated that all the shades were too dark for me, but they just expanded their shade range, and I am thrilled to have a better match for my skin!

reviews.headline: My new fav!!
reviews.comments: This is the perfect tinted moisturizer if you're looking for good coverage.  And they offer so many shade options that you can find one to match perfectly.  I love this when I'm out playing sports and want a little coverage, but something lightweight and sun protection.  50 spf!!!

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Gives good coverage and isn't sticky or greasy like similar products I've tried. They were so hopeful finding me the perfect match for my mature skin type. The price is great making it a win win purchase.

reviews.headline: Best to the Best
reviews.comments: I accidently came across this when an ulta employee recommended it to me. Now i cant go back. I'm obsessed with it! It's buildable and feels just like skin!

reviews.headline: Love The Product - Not the Packaging
reviews.comments:
It has been SO DIFFICULT to find an affordable tint with a strong SPF. Finding this was heaven sent. the coverage is very bulldable which I like and it doesn't leave you feeling cakey like some others. 

My issue is with the dispenser. Sometimes it gets clogged so you have to keep pressing down repeatedly until it sprays out, staining whatever it meets in the process. It can get messy and wasteful. If they iron that out then it would truly be the perfect product

reviews.headline: felt gross
reviews.comments: I tried twice and it just felt grainy and gross on my face and the shade was the lightest but was still way to dark for the mini.

reviews.headline: Oompa Loompa
reviews.comments: The two lightest shades are not that different and both are WAY too orange.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Beautiful color and the product feels good on my skin.

reviews.headline: Love very gentle with good coverage
reviews.comments: I love it so much it doesnt break me out or settle in my fine lines im 34 and has good coverage i got it as a sample will be purchasing

reviews.headline: Once I found my shade, I'm obsessed!
reviews.comments: I love that I found an SPF that wears like foundation, instead of the other way around. I am so excited. It did take me three tries to find the correct color, and do wish there were more neutral options. However, I found it and I'm thrilled! I have hyperpigmentation and had sun spots burned off, from using baby oil to bake in the sun in my 20s, leaving uneven skin tones. This product covers my face like a medium to full coverage foundation and doesn't look like there's anything on my skin. It's a bit too shiny for my taste, so I press a thin bit of triple-milled setting powder on top and I look flawless all day! I'm SO happy with this product and I highly recommend it!

reviews.headline: like it
reviews.comments: gives a lot of shine

media.headline: The best tinted moisturizer with spf
media.caption: Wore it all night for a soft glam look

media.headline: The SMELL is Horrendous!! Wanted to love it but can't
media.caption: The SMELL is horrendous!

faceoff_positive.comments: I am not anti chemical sunscreen in the slightest, but knowing that I am TTC this year and most dermatologists will say "out of an abundance of caution‚Ä¶" for the lack of studies, I opted to finish out my beloved spf 50 black girl sunscreen (their mineral has too much of a white cast) and look for another mineral one. So for the last 6ish months I have been researching tinted mineral sunscreens because as a black woman i REFUSE to be out here looking ashy. After reading so many reviews and comparisons, I landed on this one. Y'all‚Ä¶the way it matched my olive undertone and skin color PERFECTLY, evened my skin, and felt so hydrating without looking greasy??? I'm so shook. On most days I can't be bothered with makeup. I might put it on once a week if I'm feeling fancy. It's too much, I hate how heavy it feels on my skin, and the transfer to my clothes/hands/etc is too annoying. But this???? It just feels like I have my regular sunscreen on. I also have combo/dry skin and my skin absolutely LOVES this stuff. And it's quick. I just slather it on, maybe add some bronzer to give some dimension and some mascara. I hope this never gets discontinued. I will be a customer for the long haul. Holy grail status!!!!! Thank you!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Honestly? Where has this been my whole life.

faceoff_negative.comments:
I loved this product, the formula is great. Dewy but it stays put and isn't greasy. I only gave 2 stars because i cannot stand the smell. It smells like a dog's anal gland fluid. Iykyk. It's faint enough I didnt notice until after i applied it, but still it ruined my evening. i kept getting a whiff of it. I couldn't believe it was the makeup so i gave it a couple days, tried it again and immediately i noticed the scent before i even applied it to my face. 

I recommend 100% if you have no sense of smell or that smell doesnt bother you. Again, its kind of faint but strong enough to ruin it for me. I've yet to find another product that wears the same unfortunately. It would've beem a HG product. My fiance didn't smell it (thankfully) but a couple of my frienda ageed it was not pleasant. 

This is the first produt i had to return due to smell issues.
faceoff_negative.headline: Amazing if you can't smell.
